AI Description: Portable Computing Language (pocl) is an open-source implementation of the OpenCL standard which aims to provide a portable programming layer for execution on various devices including CPUs, GPUs, and FPGAs. It enables developers to write parallel programs that can be executed efficiently across different hardware platforms.
Core Features: Opencl Standard Implementation, Supports Cpus, Gpus, & Fpgas, Portability Across Different Hardware Architectures, Parallel Programming Support
